"Good Jobs":
"A Good Job is a way to send other players
a small message of support.
When you send a Good Job,
you and the recipient can both earn FUN.

You can send a Good Job by selecting a character
Or choosing \"Send a Good Job\"
from any of the menus below.
・Friend list
・Team member list
・Party member list
・Surrounding characters
・Communication history
・ARKS search"

"You can send a Good Job without a comment,
but if you do add a comment,
you can earn more FUN.

Sending a Good Job can only earn FUN
once a day for each recipient."
